p.d: Maxime Baltard, a former prisoner, is going straight and leading a normal life. But questions are raised when his body is found in the middle of his orchard: if he was really as white as snow, why kill him? In reality, Maxime had plenty to hide from those around him... Directed by: Lionel Chatton (season 3, France, 2018) Screenplay: Alexandra Julhiet, Laurent Vignon Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Guillemette Barioz (Sophie Vannier), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), David Marchal (Vauvert), Romain Debouchaud (Julien Garrido), Élodie Buisson (Isabelle Baltard), Guillaume Destrem (Yvan Bondeur) Genre: detective
